description:
Have you been let down by the latest Internet Marketing (IM) course that you've bought? What does each marketing tactic has to do with creating a profitable, long-lasting and sustainable Internet business?

This video course will take you from being a complete newbie to a digital marketing master. You will see digital marketing concepts being explained to you in a clear-as-day, step-by-step style.

There are a total of 6 video lectures. Total run-time is about 40 minutes.

By the end of the course, if you follow closely the instructions outlined in this course, you will no longer be confused by the piecemeal info that you'll likely to come across.

Hope you enjoy the training materials!

***Note: This course contains 100% original content that is exclusive on Udemy***
title: Digital Marketing Mastery
